channel.title: CSS on Kshitijaa Jaglan
channel.description: Recent content in CSS on Kshitijaa Jaglan

item.title: Turing
item.description: Produced a Jekyll e-magazine in a team of 10 with articles along with categories, tags, authors etc. and filters for the same. The website has been selected to host all the projects made by the UG 2k19 batch as a part of Algorithm Analysis and Design course.

item.title: Japanese Learning
item.description: Created a website initially aimed to help in my journey of learning the 46 alphabets of the hiragana script of the Japanese language The website displays hiragana alphabets picked at random with a blank to enter the pronounciation, while also giving options to hear it and generating the final score in the end.

item.title: Cutoff Filter
item.description: Designed a cutoff filter for my comfort to help choosing colleges during JoSAA counselling 2019 based on different filters like opening ranks, closing ranks, categories etc.
